explanation: [0-0] A young man with short brown hair sits on a black sofa, wearing black headphones and holding a black and white game controller, engrossed in playing games. He's wearing a red T-shirt, his expression exaggerated with wide eyes and an open mouth. Behind him, a grayish-white curtain hangs on the wall. The text "POV: That One Mf that Makes up his own Lyfics" appears at the top of the screen.
[0-2] Next, the man suddenly stops playing the game, holds the headphones with his left hand, listens to the music attentively, his mouth slightly open.
